Tonyana Cruz

The Subconscious Specialist

I am a Transformational Intuitive Tarot Reader who also utilizes the power of working with Dream Interpretation and Hypnosis. Please, allow me to be your Subconscious Specialist! I check in with your energy to see where you are headed if you continue with the same mind-set and help you make more informed decisions. How can I help you?

Get to know me

My specialty is Tarot, it is my go to as a professional Intuitive for the last 17 years. I started out do very basic Astrology charts and that information certainly helps during a reading. I also offer Hypnosis to break the self-defeating patterns that show up in our lives. My thirst for metaphysical knowledge is insatiable but...

Services

I offer a varity of different services. From affordable 20 minute sessions for getting you through that rough spot to full 1 hour hypnosis sessions to fully expand your mind and explore that Subconscious space. Click learn more to find my full services.
